title: Subway typography… Helvetica
content:
Hi!

I wonder what subway of word use Helvetica in its visual identity.  
I know that cities like Madrid, Barcelona or New York use it.  
I read that Washington and Helsinki, as well. Someone can confirm this?  
You know most subway that use Helvetica?

Thank you very much and sorry for my English!
author: PabloL

comments.content: Both the Tokyo Metro (subway) and Japan Rail (JR) East make heavy use of Helvetica for their English signage. Some of the other railway operators in & around Tokyo use it as well, but I don't recall offhand if they all do.
